sentences.english: All advertising tells lies, but there are little lies and there are big lies.
sentences.chinese: 所有廣告都在扯謊，只不過是小謊和大謊的區別。

sentences.english: To tell even a little fib gose against my grain.
sentences.chinese: 即使撒點小謊，也違揹我的個性。

sentences.english: Even little fibs can be perilous to careers.
sentences.chinese: 即使一點點小謊也對工作有害。
